game.name: HAREM！RANCH LIFE
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: This is a relaxing farm RPG game where you can earn money by collecting and raising livestock! Interact with adorable villagers to increase your popularity in the village through chatting and giving gifts. Please enjoy a cozy farm life in this small village!
game.shortDescriptionEn: This is a relaxing farm RPG game where you can earn money by collecting and raising livestock! Interact with adorable villagers to increase your popularity in the village through chatting and giving gifts. Please enjoy a cozy farm life in this small village!
